dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context
Class AbstractContext

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.lib2.api.util.AbstractExecutableExtension
      dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.context.AbstractContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
IContext, java.lang.Cloneable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IExecutableExtension
Direct Known Subclasses:
ECUConfigContext, ModuleConfigContext, SystemConfigContext
public abstract class AbstractContext
extends AbstractExecutableExtension
implements IContext, java.lang.Cloneable

This is a convenient base class for IContext that represent the current selection/state of the tool.

Contexts are queried via the ContextManager by a context specific id: 

 ContextManager manager = ContextManager.getInstance();
 ECUConfigContext ecuConfigContext = (ECUConfigContext)manager.getContext( ECUConfigContext.ID );

If a context is currently active (depending on the state (e.g. commandline vs. GUI) of the tool and the current selection in the GUI) can be queried with isEnabled().

if you implement a new context please register the new context with the ContextManager via the configcontext extension-point: 

  <extension
       point="dreisoft.tresos.guidedconfig.api.plugin.configcontext">
    <configcontext>
       <contextclass
             class="com.company.MyContext">
       </contextclass>
    </configcontext>
 </extension>

Copyright (C) Elektrobit Automotive GmbH - All rights reserved
